tool_description:
Verifica ante el Servicio de Administración Tributaria la información proporcionada.

NOTA: Solo funciona en Mexico
name: VerificadorRFC
title: VerificadorRFC

api_list.name: Verificar información fiscal
api_list.description: Consulta la información los registros actuales del SAT México
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://verificadorrfc.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verificadorrfc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://verificadorrfc.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "verificadorrfc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
